### Xray Processor W3474-230313

#### Rationale and Requirements
The Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF) at CFB Trenton has an immediate requirement for three (3) X-Ray Processors, complete with associated equipment, to meet their inspection, maintenance, and repair needs.


#### Invitation to Bid
This is a competitive call for bids for One (1) contract with two (2) option periods, one being a one-year Option A and another ten-unit purchase option. Bids must be submitted electronically through the Ariba Discovery platform by February 24, 2023, 14:00 Eastern Daylight Time (EDT).

#### Specifications
Bids are requested for NSN: 6535-01-654-4602 GE000OECANF X-Ray Processors, comprising:
- NDT-M-ECO FILM 5203/300
- WHI19961-SS Mixer
- IS-199 space-saver 7.5 Gallon-A.G. DEV/A.G. FIX
- WHIT1923 Spill Tray
- Mixer IS-199 & WHI1924 Lid
- Dev Floating (for IS-199)

#### Selection Criteria
Bids will be evaluated based on price, with the lowest price bidder being selected for contract award.

#### Trade Agreements
This tender is open to bidders listed under various trade agreements, including Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and others.

#### Contact Information
For further information, please contact:
Allison Fernandez
Supply and Services Canada
allison.fernandez@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Notice Details
* Tender Reference: WS3759548847 Doc3846708900
* Tender Number: WS3759548847
* Amendment Number: 1
* Date of Publication: 2023-01-27
* Closing Date: 2023-02-27, 14:00 EDT
